title: Everest Base Camp Trek
description: Experience the ultimate adventure with our Everest Base Camp trek. Journey through the heart of the Himalayas and witness breathtaking mountain views.

activities.name: Mountain Views
activities.description: Spectacular views of world's highest peaks

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Arrive at Tribhuvan International Airport. Transfer to hotel. Trip briefing and preparation.

itinerary.title: Fly to Lukla, Trek to Phakding
itinerary.description: Early morning flight to Lukla (2,840m). Begin trek to Phakding (2,610m). Walking time: 3-4 hours.

itinerary.title: Trek to Namche Bazaar
itinerary.description: Trek to Namche Bazaar (3,440m), the gateway to Everest. Cross suspension bridges and enter Sagarmatha National Park.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization Day in Namche
itinerary.description: Rest day for acclimatization. Optional hike to Everest View Hotel or visit local markets.

itinerary.title: Trek to Tengboche
itinerary.description: Trek to Tengboche (3,860m). Visit the famous Tengboche Monastery with stunning mountain views.

fitness_requirements: Good physical fitness required. Regular cardio exercise recommended 2-3 months before trek.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 15 days before departure
